questions.question: Which group of Small Worlds is ordered correctly from closest to farthest from the Sun?

choices.answer: Near Earth Objects > Kuiper Belt > Asteroid Belt
Kuiper Belt > Asteroid Belt > Near Earth Objects
Near Earth Objects > Asteroid Belt > Kuiper Belt
Asteroid Belt > Near Earth Objects > Kuiper Belt

imageMetadata.resources: ASU: Center for Education Through Exploration

questions.question: Which group of Small Worlds typically moves the slowest?

choices.answer: None. They all move approximately the same speed

questions.question: What is the best interpretation of this graph?

choices.answer: Planets that are further away take longer to orbit
Larger planets are always the furthest away
Planets that are closer take longer to orbit
Smaller planets always have faster orbits
